synonyms: sūkṣmāṇām—of the minute particles; api—certainly; aham—I; jīvaḥ—the living entity.
translation: " 'Among minute particles, I am the living entity.'

purport.content: The living entity is one with and different from the Supreme Personality of Godhead. As spirit soul, the living entity is one in quality with the Supreme Lord; however, the Supreme Lord is bigger than the biggest, and the living entity is the smallest of the small. This quote is the third pada of a verse from Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam (11.16.11).
